import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; import heroBg from '../assets/images/hero-bg.jpg'; const Dashboard = () => { const [systemTime, setSystemTime] = useState(new Date().toLocaleTimeString()); useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setSystemTime(new Date().toLocaleTimeString()); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, []); return (

ID: AGENT-007 // SIMULACIONES ACTIVAS: 2/7
